articles.author: Angela Yang, Dennis Romero, Marlene Lenthang, Tom Namako, Tom Winter
articles.title: 6-year-old Palestinian American boy is killed in anti-Muslim attack in Illinois, authorities say - NBC News
articles.description: An Illinois man stabbed a 6-year-old boy to death and critically wounded his mother in an alleged anti-Muslim hate crime, authorities said
articles.content: A 6-year-old Palestinian American boy was stabbed to death in his Illinois home by his landlord, who also critically wounded the boy's mother in an alleged anti-Muslim hate crime, police said Sunday,… [+6807 chars]
